name: ZX Spectrum Loading Screen Generator
description: Generate ZX Spectrum–style loading screens from user text prompts. The app uses Gemini to refine prompts and Imagen to generate images, which are then processed to match the classic 15-color Speccy palette and aesthetic. Relive the nostalgia of 1980s 8-bit computing with authentic 256×192 pixel art.
author: Wayne Rockett
